to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: TTSynth Is Available Again
body:
Okay I am now curious, TTSynth and Voxin are two speech
packages for purchase that include the IBM TTS which was 
free, and yet the viavoice doesn't seem to be downloadable 
anywhere anymore. Is there nowhere to download the IBM 
TTS anymore? Was it licensed for resale or something?

  -- Spie
